answer: iPlayer - 11% growth (1112 million usages), up to 17 million weekly active accounts. BBC Online accounted for the rest of the BBC's online audience, with specific figures detailed within the 2023/24 Annual Report and Accounts, which also notes earlier annual reports spanning 2022 and beyond.
ground_truth: BBC Online account usage grew 11% year-on-year in 2023; BBC iPlayer had a record-breaking year in 2023
